name: jtox-kit
description: A JavaScript client library of chem-informatics related widgets, components, etc.

scripts.core: rm -f www/$npm_package_name*.js && rollup -c && sed -E -e "s/\{\{VERSION\}\}/$npm_package_version/" $npm_package_main | terser -b --comments -o $npm_package_main && terser $npm_package_main -mc --ie8 --keep-fnames -o www/${npm_package_name}.min.js
scripts.kits: cat src/kits/*.js > www/${npm_package_config_kitsname}.js && cat src/kits/*.html | bin/html2js.pl --trim >> www/${npm_package_config_kitsname}.js && terser www/${npm_package_config_kitsname}.js -mc --ie8 --keep-fnames -o www/${npm_package_config_kitsname}.min.js && concat src/css/*.css -o www/${npm_package_name}.css
scripts.build: npm run core && npm run kits
scripts.test: npm run prepare && mocha test --require expectations
scripts.libs: rsync node_modules/lodash/lodash*.js www/libs && rsync node_modules/as-sys/as-sys*.js www/libs && rsync node_modules/ambit-jsx/ambit-jsx*.js www/libs && rsync node_modules/solr-jsx/solr-jsx*.js www/libs
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run libs && npm run archive
scripts.postpublish: git push && git tag -am "Release $npm_package_version." ${npm_package_version} && git push --tags
